channel.title: Player List vanished for 2 days
channel.description:
#### What happened? The Player List on the right side suddenly vanished
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Not to vanish
#### Steps to reproduce: It just suddenly vanished and reappeared after 2 ingame-days
#### Comments:

item.title: Player List vanished for 2 days
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
Had this happen as well, though only for one day.

Sadly, I don’t remember my class or anything else that happened.

Read full topic

item.title: Player List vanished for 2 days
item.dc:creator: Aurelia
item.description:
Confirmed. It vanished for 2 whole days, unable to vote. 3 peeps left. That’s also when the bug occurred i posted about. Apostle died, but somehow didn’t and the game “looped” itself

Read full topic

item.title: Player List vanished for 2 days

item.description:
What happened?

The Player List on the right side suddenly vanished

What was SUPPOSED to happen? Not to vanish

Steps to reproduce: It just suddenly vanished and reappeared after 2 ingame-days
